message:
Breaking News: Birth of the latest Kingdom in South East Asia - 'The Kingdom of Bangladesh' ruled by the Royal 'Sheikh' family. Her Majesty Sheikh Hasina is the Queen of Bangladesh and the Crown Prince , Sheikh Joy is the king in waiting. Protected by her royal guard 'Bangladesh Awami League (BAL) " and the Royal armed forces, the Queen is safely guarded in her palace. Any person that dare speak against the Queen shall be found guilty of treason and put to death. The royal police force is busy hunting down all traitors and putting them to justice. Long live the Queen , long live the Royal Kingdom of Bangladesh.

Nabil Ahsan
